description.value: You can intuit how even the most interesting vehicles function. You can pilot a ship even if it would be physiologically impossible for you, including those that require telepathy or other supernatural abilities. You can use Piloting instead of Crafting to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Repair] a part of a vehicle, starship, or mech with a –2 circumstance penalty as long as you have the appropriate parts available to you. You can use Piloting instead of Computers to Hack a vehicle, starship, or mech with a –2 circumstance penalty.
